title: Chocolate and coffee mudcake
ingredients: ['250g butter', '250g plain chocolate, chopped', '550g granulated sugar', '175ml hot water', '2 tablespoons instant coffee', '125ml milk', '4 eggs', '30ml vegetable oil', '300g plain flour', '55g cocoa powder', '2 teaspoons baking powder', '1 teaspoon salt', '1/2 teaspoon bicarbonate of soda']
